org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists
Class PeList

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.lists.PeList
Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerPeList
public class PeList
extends java.lang.Object

PeList is a collection of operations on lists of PEs.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Anton Beloglazov

setPeStatus

public static <T extends Pe> boolean setPeStatus(java.util.List<Pe> peList,
                                                 int id,
                                                 int status)
Sets the Pe status.

Parameters:
status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
id - the id
peList - the pe list
Returns:
true if the Pe status has been changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)

setStatusFailed

public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed(java.util.List<Pe> peList,
                                                  java.lang.String resName,
                                                  int hostId,
                                                  boolean failed)
Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED. NOTE: resName and machineID are used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use #setStatusFailed(boolean) if you do not want this information.

Parameters:
resName - the name of the resource
hostId - the id of this machine
failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter

setStatusFailed

public static <T extends Pe> void setStatusFailed(java.util.List<Pe> peList,
                                                  boolean failed)
Sets the status of PEs of this machine to FAILED.

Parameters:
failed - the new value for the "failed" parameter
peList - the pe list
